about_the_game:
WASD: Move forward, backward, left, and right.

Gameplay:
When the protagonist steps on an icon, a gauge will fill up. Once the gauge is full, an item will appear. Use these items to craft and create new items.

Weapons:
The simplest weapon to craft is a sword. A sword can be crafted using "stone" and "wooden stick."

Crafting:
When the player steps on the icon with a crossed hammer and wrench, a crafting interface will appear. Place items in the designated slots and press the hammer button to start crafting. If the required items are present, the crafting will succeed, and an item will be created. If unnecessary items are present, the crafting will fail.

Shopping:
There are three shops on the map. When the player steps on a shop icon, the shop menu will open. In these three shops, you can purchase "animals," "stages," and "allies."

  • Animals: Chickens produce eggs, which can serve as an early source of income.

  • Save money to purchase stages.

  • Allies: There are four types of allies—soldier, nurse, robot, and thief.

    • The soldier shoots enemies with a gun.

    • The nurse heals the player's health.

    • The robot restores the durability of cards.

    • The thief periodically drops money.

Enemies:
Zombies can throw cards or deal damage by touching the protagonist. Craft weapons to defeat them.

Objective:
The ultimate goal is to craft a ship and escape the island. You can craft a ship using the necessary items, "sail" + "turbine." This is the goal of the game.

Others:
In the bottom left corner of the screen, there are two icons.

  • Clicking the crossed hammer and wrench icon will show you the items required for crafting.

  • Clicking the notebook icon will save the game.

If the required items are present, the crafting will succeed, and an item will be created. If unnecessary items are present, the crafting will fail.

  • Clicking the notebook icon will save the game.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 High Sierra以降
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: macOS標準のオーディオサポート
  • Additional Notes: null

name: Icon_survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+ (64-bit推奨)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.0 GHz以上
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound互換のサウンドカード
  • VR Support: null
  • Additional Notes: null
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Escape from the Zombie Island Use cards scattered around the map to collect items Craft items Attempt to escape before the map is overrun by zombies
